error.title: Event not found
error.description: This event does not exist or has been deleted.

genealogy.splitDescription: This event was automatically separated from a larger topic for more accurate reporting.
genealogy.mergeDescription: This event was merged from smaller topics into a single, more comprehensive report.
genealogy.tooltip: In Pollar, events have their own genealogy — they evolve, grow, and when a topic becomes too broad, the system automatically splits it into smaller, more focused reports. This keeps every event readable and on-topic.

untranslated.title: This article is not yet available in English
untranslated.description: You are viewing the original Polish version. Translation will be available soon.
